fields.name: Spike Traps (Night, 4 Uses):
fields.value: Place spiked traps outside target player's room. ~~Occupy~~ Roleblock that player and anyone else targeting him.

fields.name: Snare Traps (Night, 2 Uses):
fields.value: Place a snare trap outside target player's room. If they leave their room, they will be ~~occupied~~ roleblocked for 2 nights.
